nodes.text: Mos Entha was a settlement built across from the Mospic High Range, on the desert planet Tatooine. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure kept slave pens in Mos Entha. At some point, his operations in the town were infiltrated and disrupted by Jarm Brock, who worked for Crimson Dawn. In response, Jabba sent teams to kill Brock and his enforcers but these attempts failed, leading the Hutt to hire information broker Deva Lompop to work with bounty hunter Boba Fett in order to complete the job.

Mos Entha was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, which was written by Kristin Lund and released on October 1, 2001. The settlement was then first mentioned in canon when elements from Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I were rereleased as part of the reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations on September 27, 2016.
